snippet.title: Skydance New Media | Trailer | Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
snippet.description:
Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra - In the chaos of war, worlds collide. Skydance New Media and Marvel Games share an original story where an ensemble of four heroes must overcome their differences and form an uneasy alliance to confront their common enemy. #GDC #Marvel1943

Follow Skydance Media
www.Facebook.com/SkydanceMedia
www.Twitter.com/Skydance
www.Instagram.com/Skydance 

Skydance is the diversified media company founded by David Ellison in 2010 to create high-quality, event-level entertainment for global audiences. The company first launched with Feature Films and has since strategically expanded to include Television, Interactive, Animation, New Media, and Sports. Skydance’s recent films include TOP GUN: MAVERICK, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE - DEAD RECKONING PART ONE, TRANSFORMERS: RISE OF THE BEASTS, HEART OF STONE, GHOSTED, THE ADAM PROJECT, THE OLD GUARD and THE TOMORROW WAR. Skydance Television's slate includes GRACE AND FRANKIE, FOUNDATION, TOM CLANCY’S JACK RYAN, REACHER, CROSS, THE BIG DOOR PRIZE, and FUBAR.  Skydance Sports' slate includes GOOD RIVALS, NFL DRAFT: THE PICK IS IN, KELCE, AIR and the docu-series chronicling the Dallas Cowboys. Skydance Interactive is known for THE WALKING DEAD: SAINTS AND SINNERS and Skydance New Media has projects in the works with Marvel and LucasFilms. Skydance Animation’s slate includes LUCK, SPELLBOUND and WONDLA.
